{"step_by_step_thinking": "Gutta percha is a material used in endodontics for root canal fillings. The solvent used for gutta percha should be safe and effective. Terpentine is not commonly used in medical procedures due to its potential toxicity. Methylchloroform and Halothane are both anesthetics and not typically used as solvents in dental procedures. Chloroform, on the other hand, is a well-known solvent for gutta percha and is commonly used in endodontic procedures due to its effectiveness and relative safety.", "answer_choice": "B. Choloroform"}
